US business group in Taiwan sees falling but still high geopolitical concernsAlmost half of companies surveyed by the American Chamber of Commerce (AmCham) in Taiwan consider geopolitical concerns a deterrence to expanding or investing in the island but that number has significantly dropped even as China tensions remain. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 03:58:09 GMT LXLEAAR4XZNZXOJQURYGTRX7OQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/us-business-group-taiwan-sees-falling-still-high-geopolitical-concerns-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Tencent chief says gaming business under threat, catching up in AIPony Ma, chief executive and co-founder of Tencent Holdings , has said that the company's video games business faces great challenges from competitors but is catching up in artificial intelligence (AI) development. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 03:45:14 GMT 6EPPPZFFPRPXBGIUJIESRI333E https://www.reuters.com/technology/tencent-chief-says-gaming-business-under-threat-keeping-up-ai-2024-01-30/Josh Ye技术被破坏
Vietnam, Philippines seal deals on South China Sea securityVietnam and the Philippines agreed on Tuesday to boost cooperation among their coastguards and to prevent untoward incidents in the South China Sea, in an announcement during a state visit to Hanoi by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:54:16 GMT KLJJFXA7EJMHFKDPXUWFW7SPBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-philippines-seal-deals-south-china-sea-security-2024-01-30/Khanh Vu世界亚太地区
Stocks in Asia slip as China property sector worries weighAsian shares fell on Tuesday, hurt by the court-ordered liquidation of property giant China Evergrande while rising geopolitical tensions propped up oil prices and kept a lid on risk appetite ahead of the Federal Reserve's meeting Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:47:50 GMT ZLAV624D6JJ5FBB7LIHIYS4XBU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-01-30/Ankur Banerjee市场
Hong Kong leader starts push for new security laws, says city "can't afford to wait"Hong Kong's leader confirmed on Tuesday his intention to pass tighter national security laws soon to build on sweeping legislation Beijing imposed on the city in 2020, saying the city "could not afford to wait" . Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:18:18 GMT GMDHVRQJYZLDLC752YVPL7BH4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-leaders-start-legislative-push-tighten-national-security-laws-2024-01-30/Jessie Pang, Greg Torode世界中国
Toyota keeps crown as world's top-selling automaker in 2023Toyota Motor sold a record 11.2 million vehicles in 2023, it said on Tuesday, taking the crown as the world's top-selling automaker for a fourth straight year. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:07:59 GMT 75B547QBFBJ2VGW7MWMQZTRGOU https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/toyota-keeps-crown-worlds-top-sales-automaker-2023-2024-01-30/Reuters商业汽车与交通
